findings.title: Misspelling of Withdrawal event
findings.description: The Pod contract contains an event named 'Withdrawl' which appears to be a misspelling of the word 'Withdrawal'. This could cause confusion for users or issues in future contract updates.

findings.title: Inconsistent multiple token drops
findings.description: The Pod contract had the drop storage field and mapping of different TokenDrops (token => TokenDrop). When adding a new TokenDrop in the mapping, the drop field is also changed to the added _tokenDrop. However, all TokenDrops are supposed to have the same asset and measure tokens, making it useless to have different TokenDrops.
